item.title: 1. About WeisMind
item.description: Welcome to the temporary home of WeisMind, a rad studio that creates content that sharpens your mind so you have the only weapon you’ll ever need to defeat fear, fight ignorance, and discover truth, love, and happiness. It is likely that you were directed here via the WeisMind Newsletter - yes, you are on the correct page to learn about WeisMind. I’ve got a lot going on right now since I just launched WeisMind, on top of trying to find full-time employment as a full-stack developer, creating a lot of other content, and trying to get out of my current situation that I am in.
